entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. High minus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then southeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
